content:
is that ERD was normalized?

Entities:

Customer (customer\_id, name, address, contact\_details, kyc\_details)

Account (account\_number, account\_type, account\_balance, account\_status)

Transaction (transaction\_id, transaction\_type, transaction\_date, transaction\_amount, transaction\_status)

Loan (loan\_id, loan\_type, loan\_amount, interest\_rate, repayment\_schedule)

Credit (credit\_limit, credit\_utilization, credit\_score, credit\_status)

Risk (risk\_id, risk\_type, risk\_level, risk\_status)

Compliance (compliance\_id, compliance\_type, compliance\_status, compliance\_deadline)

Treasury (investment\_portfolio, cash\_reserves, forex\_transactions)

Business Intelligence (revenue, profitability, market\_share, kpi)

Integration/API (api\_endpoints, api\_keys, integration\_status)

Relationships:

Customer has many Accounts

Account belongs to one Customer and has many Transactions

Transaction belongs to one Account

Customer can have many Loans

Loan belongs to one Customer

Account can have many Loans

Credit belongs to one Customer

Risk belongs to one Customer

Compliance belongs to one Customer

Treasury belongs to one Customer

Business Intelligence belongs to one Customer

Integration/API belongs to one Customer1 / 1지금 번역하기
